query:
SELECT
                code,
                title,
                city
            FROM
                lines
            WHERE
                (
                    code ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                    OR TO_TSVECTOR( title ) @@ websearch_to_tsquery('' || $1 || ':*')
                )
                AND city = $2
            GROUP BY
                code, title, city
            LIMIT 20
